name: Tea Time with SEESQE
description:
From the developers that brought you Why Karl Marx Would Have Joined MobM, Soup and Cavs have released their second ever visual novel, made in 3 hours for the game jam Trijam!

Tea Time with SEESQE is a sweet little story about two people (?) coming together over a cup of tea and business plans. What could possibly go wrong?

Features:

  • Over 700-word gripping story!
  • 14 unique digital art pieces!
  • Lots of tea!

There’s also a hot spider lady!

(Note: This game will get updates later on, this is just the version for the Trijam)
